name: Talkic
overview:
Talkic.com is a social network for social change.

Talkic.com is a social network where contributing to topics benefits causes (also known as a social network where topics are friends that benefit causes) as we donate 1.1 cents every click to your choice of more than 20 charities from Canada, The US and UK (which represents about 2/3rds of the money we make from displaying ads on the site).

Talkic.com is a social twist on the concept of clicking for a cause, and a topical twist on the concept of following people on social networks.

Talkic.com’s musical sidekick TalkicMusic.com, is a free new music marketing and promotion service for unsigned musicians. Whenever a musician shares their songs on Talkic.com, their tunes are displayed on the homepage and get tweeted and posted out to other social networks as well.
